titleStmt.title: An answer to the Bishop of Condom's book entituled, An exposition of the doctrin of the Caholick Church, upon matters of coutroversie [sic]. Written originally in French.
titleStmt.author: La Bastide, Marc-Antoine de, ca. 1624-1704, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty; and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde in Castlestreet,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Marc Antione de la Bastide.
French original, author, and translator not traced.
Register and text continuous despite pagination.
With an initial imprimatur leaf; with a table of contents at end of text, and a final errata leaf.
In response to Bossuet, Jacques Bénigne. Exposition de la doctrine de l'eglise catholique.
Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London.
